headline.main: Greece Can Conclude Hellenikon Property Lease by Autumn-Finance Minister
headline.print_headline: Greece Can Conclude Hellenikon Property Lease by Autumn-Finance Minister

docs.snippet: Greece can conclude a multi-billion euro deal to lease a prime seaside property at the former airport site of Hellenikon by autumn, the finance minister said on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Greece can conclude a multi-billion euro deal to lease a prime seaside property at the former airport site of Hellenikon by autumn, the finance minister said on Monday.

headline.main: Linked to Taliban and ISIS, Pakistani Group Seizes Notoriety With Bomb in Park
headline.print_headline: Linked to Taliban and ISIS, Pakistani Group Seizes Notoriety With Bomb in Park

docs.snippet: The Taliban faction that killed at least 70 people, many of them children, in a park in Lahore on Easter Sunday has been quickly gaining attention in militant circles....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Taliban faction that killed at least 70 people, many of them children, in a park in Lahore on Easter Sunday has been quickly gaining attention in militant circles.

headline.main: North Korean Nuclear Threats Spotlight US Missile Defense
headline.print_headline: North Korean Nuclear Threats Spotlight US Missile Defense

docs.snippet: As North Korea rattles its nuclear saber, threatening to bomb the U.S. at "any moment," a nerve-jangling question hangs in the air: If Pyongyang did launch a nuclear-armed missile at an American city, could the Pentagon's missile defenses overcome...
docs.lead_paragraph: As North Korea rattles its nuclear saber, threatening to bomb the U.S. at "any moment," a nerve-jangling question hangs in the air: If Pyongyang did launch a nuclear-armed missile at an American city, could the Pentagon's missile defenses overcome their spotty test record and shoot it down beyond U.S. shores?

headline.main: Seeking Clues About Terror Cells: First Find Out Who Lives
headline.print_headline: Seeking Clues About Terror Cells: First Find Out Who Lives

docs.snippet: The bomb maker, the transporter, the landlord and the cipher. The four men slipped away after the Nov. 13 attacks in Paris, and all but one reappeared as key figures in the Islamic State cell that went on to attack Brussels....
docs.lead_paragraph: The bomb maker, the transporter, the landlord and the cipher. The four men slipped away after the Nov. 13 attacks in Paris, and all but one reappeared as key figures in the Islamic State cell that went on to attack Brussels.

headline.main: Ex-President of Honduras Admits to Bribery in FIFA Scandal
headline.print_headline: Ex-President of Honduras Admits to Bribery in FIFA Scandal

docs.snippet: A former president of Honduras pleaded guilty to conspiracy charges on Monday, admitting that he solicited hundreds of thousands of dollars in bribes in the wide-ranging FIFA soccer scandal over lucrative broadcast rights....
docs.lead_paragraph: A former president of Honduras pleaded guilty to conspiracy charges on Monday, admitting that he solicited hundreds of thousands of dollars in bribes in the wide-ranging FIFA soccer scandal over lucrative broadcast rights.

headline.main: Argentina Cuts Ties With Leftist TV Network Telesur
headline.print_headline: Argentina Cuts Ties With Leftist TV Network Telesur

docs.snippet: Argentina's pro-business government is pulling the plug on its involvement in the Spanish-language TV network that was started by the late Venezuelan leader Hugo Chavez, saying the broadcaster blocks alternative viewpoints....
docs.lead_paragraph: Argentina's pro-business government is pulling the plug on its involvement in the Spanish-language TV network that was started by the late Venezuelan leader Hugo Chavez, saying the broadcaster blocks alternative viewpoints.

headline.main: Trump Looks to Decertify Louisiana Delegates
headline.print_headline: Trump Looks to Decertify Louisiana Delegates

docs.snippet: Donald Trump's presidential campaign said Monday it plans to challenge Louisiana's electoral delegate selection, a day after the GOP candidate threatened to sue over the possibility that the state's uncommitted delegates could back his rival, Ted ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Donald Trump's presidential campaign said Monday it plans to challenge Louisiana's electoral delegate selection, a day after the GOP candidate threatened to sue over the possibility that the state's uncommitted delegates could back his rival, Ted Cruz.

headline.main: ‘How Would an All Out War Stop Such Atrocities?’ Readers on the Brussels Attacks

docs.snippet: Most readers were skeptical that military action would make the West more secure....
docs.abstract: Most readers were skeptical that military action would make the West more secure.
